actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To provide for the payment of aid to families with dependent children through the use of debit cards.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require State plans to establish a debit card account for each AFDC recipient into which the State will deposit aid payable, which shall be accessible to the recipient only through the use of the debit card.

titles.title: To provide for the payment of aid to families with dependent children through the use of debit cards.
